Articles.Content:
The current explosions in-game are (most likely) place holders, and when better explosions are implemented, how do you think they should be like? I think they should be a combination of the old (13.0) and current explosions.

Edited November 9, 2013 by Hanoj
Typo
Some scaling would be nice. A full orange tank should make a much larger explosion than an empty one.

Also, the explosions should damages the parts near it.

It would make escape tower with high TWR useful.
There are some parts in the game that explode even though they really shouldn't.
I'd like metal objects to only explode if they collide with things at more than 500m/s. Otherwise, they should just tear and bend.
